title: Looking for D5 and above Jungler and Top Laner to Join Qlick Gaming!
body:
Qlick Gaming, are a newly founded team, with aspirations of making it all the way to the OPL and beyond, however to do so, we need your help!
We are currently looking for Diamond V and above players, in the roles of jungler and top laner. Your roles may be sub or starting depending on your performance in practice, in the team environment and scrims in comparison to other members on the team. If you're interested be sure to either reply to this very post, add Lordathis in game or e-mail management@qlickgaming.com to get in contact with us!

ERTHLANG {{champion:106}} 
Community Manager
Qlick Gaming
